org.jhotdraw.contrib
Class PolygonFigure

java.lang.Object
  org.jhotdraw.standard.AbstractFigure
      org.jhotdraw.figures.AttributeFigure
          org.jhotdraw.contrib.PolygonFigure
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable, Figure, java.io.Serializable, Storable
Direct Known Subclasses:
PolygonFigureGeometricAdapter
public class PolygonFigure
extends AttributeFigure

A scalable, rotatable polygon with an arbitrary number of points Based on PolyLineFigure

Version:
<$CURRENT_VERSION$>
